name: BoxBob
description:
BoxBob is a challenging puzzle game with 16 levels, where you play as Bob, on a journey to be the best at his job.

I hope you have fun, thank you for playing!

FEATURING

  • 16 headscratching levels
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Slippery Ice
  • Lots of boxes

CONTROLS

WASD, ARROWS - MOVE

R - RESTART

U, Z - UNDO

M - MUTE MUSIC

N - MUTE SFX
